title: 779: BITCOIN WILL STABILIZE AROUND 100X THE PRICE OF AN OUNCE OF GOLD AS MONEY MANAGERS ALLOCATE TO BTC!!
description:
Bloomberg’s head commodity strategist Mike McGlone says the crypto markets look poised for a bullish 2022, with Bitcoin and Ethereum set to lead the charge.

In the long term, the commodity strategist says that Bitcoin could ultimately find a stable price somewhere in the neighborhood of 100x the price of an ounce of gold, which right now would be $178,300.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit YT channel at: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
